original_text: And when the cloud was taken up from the tabernacle, then after that the children of Israel journeyed: and in the place where the cloud abode, there the children of Israel pitched their tents.
korean_text: 구름이 성막에서 떠오르는 때에는 이스라엘 자손이 곧 행진하였고 구름이 머무는 곳에 이스라엘 자손이 진을 쳤으니

sentences.original_text: And when the cloud was taken up
and in the place where the cloud abode
there the children of Israel pitched their tents
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에서 이스라엘 자손들이 그들의 장막을 쳤다
